attributes.action: Regulate the use of LED / Halogen Headlights on cars as they may cause crashes
attributes.additional_details: I am all to familiar with being bright lights shone in my face, almost causing me to crash while driving due to my sight being briefly blinded. Have some form of regulations on the use of these lights so there are no crashes
attributes.background: Regulate the use of LED and Halogen lights as there has been multiple complaints by drivers regarding bright lights being shone in their eyes, temporarily blinded or distracted

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban LED headlights
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701233
